entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 8:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
